How We Can Help

Your Health is Our Business

Allergies

Allergy symptoms occur when your body’s immune system overreacts to a normally harmless substance (food, pollens, grasses and dust). The body mistakenly interprets the allergen —the dust or food— as a threat to the body and mounts a strong immune defense against it known as a hypersensitivity reaction. It’s a sign of an over-reactive immune system and that something is out of balance in the body.

Allergy Testing Allergy Treatments
Autoimmune Disorder

Autoimmune Disorders happen when the body’s natural defense system can’t tell the difference between your own cells and foreign cells, causing the body to mistakenly attack normal cells. We treat a wide range of autoimmune conditions affecting a huge breadth of body parts, including Thyroid problems, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Reynaud’s and Psoriasis.

Brain Health

Naturopathic Medicine deals with many brain health issues including brain tumours, epilepsy, chronic headaches, poor memory and dementia. All brain health problems can be the result of another condition and we can help you identify the root cause of the issues.

Digestive Health

Through a number of different treatment options including diet changes and allergy testing, your Naturopathic Physician can help you overcome a wide range of digestive health concerns including IBS, Crohn’s Disease and Leaky Gut Syndrome.

Emotional Wellbeing

The body and the mind are undeniably connected. Your Naturopathic Physician will work with you to create a holistic plan - focusing on nutrition, stress management and any other treatment options available - that will treat any imbalances in the body in order to improve your emotional health.

Counselling and Lifestyle Management
Fatigue

Fatigue is an overwhelming feeling of exhaustion that, at times, can be solved with rest however, sometimes this isn’t the solution. When fatigue is combined with other symptoms it can be even more difficult to treat. Your Naturopathic Physician can help you heal by identifying the reason you are feeling acutely tired and effectively addressing it.

Chronic Fatigue Management
Fertility

Knowing that every case is different, Naturopathic Physicians are trained to help you navigate through the world of reproductive medicine by prescribing you with a mix of treatments that are right for your individual needs leading to a higher chance of successful conception.

General Health Support

A Naturopathic Physician’s focus will always be on building strong foundations for your overall health and wellbeing by making sure that you are the healthiest you can be through a multitude of different treatments and approaches.

Meet Our Doctors
Hormone Support

Hormones are chemical messengers produced in the body that have specific effects on other cells and organs so any imbalance in them can have an impact on many facets of your health including fertility, menstrual irregularities, menopause and libido. Your Naturopathic Physician can help with the balancing of all hormone systems within the body.

Hormone Testing
Heavy Metal Detox

An accumulation in your tissues of heavy metals, like mercury, lead and uranium, from our environment can impact your physical health. Initially, we will determine if the level of heavy metal in your body is impacting you physically and if it is, we will build a safe and effective plan to remove the toxic metals from your system.

Heavy Metal Testing Detox Treatments
Pain Management

Chronic pain, whether it be sports injuries, chronic headaches or a motor vehicle accident, can be debilitating. Our treatment begins with identifying the root cause of your pain. Once that is identified we will pick the most effective path from the variety of pain modalities we use, all of which are part of a whole body approach to provide long lasting pain relief.

Pain Management Treatments
Thyroid Issues

Your thyroid controls many of your body’s functions. An over or underactive thyroid can cause many issues throughout the body including fatigue, depression, hair loss, headaches, unexplained weight gain or loss, anxiety, decreased memory or concentration, among many others.

Naturopathic Physicians can evaluate and treat a dysfunctional thyroid by doing a complete blood test, identifying the root cause of your issues and offering treatment that will help relieve your symptoms.

Thyroid Testing
Thyroid Issues

Naturopathic Physicians are trained to identify and treat the underlying cause of sleep issues, which can range from nutrition, microbiome imbalance, your environment and emotional or physical stressors. The treatment chosen will depend on the cause they identify and could range from lifestyle changes to addressing a microbiome imbalance.

Skin Disorders

We see a range of skin disorders, skin infections and skin conditions and through a combination of lifestyle changes and prescribed medications, your Naturopathic Physician can help you on the path to clear skin.

IV Therapies

At Vancouver Naturopathic Clinic we regularly use IV Therapies to boost the immune system, aid in skin rejuvenation, improve circulation and elevate energy levels.

The correct dose of nutrients, given intravenously to patients, aids in the treatment of a wide range of ailments and is proven to fight various diseases and boost your health, energy and overall well being.

Immune Support

Vancouver Naturopathic Clinic can support you with managing a range of different Immune Conditions such as asthma, eczema, psoriasis and Fibromyalgia.

Weight Loss Management

We can help build an individualized weight loss program that is safe, effective and time proven. By identifying your medical history, current conditions and the cause of your weight gain, they can prescribe you a program that’s customized for you combining diet and nutritional management, exercise and metabolic stimulation to make the changes you want.

Sexual Health

Both men and women’s sexual health can be managed with the help and guidance of a Naturopathic Physician. Through the appropriate diagnostic and therapeutic services we can assess your current health and help you to identify the correct treatment path for you. These services can be utilized in conjunction with standard gynecological approaches or as stand alone treatments.

This list is not exhaustive so please feel free to call or email the clinic to find out whether we can help with your specific health concern.

Ready to start your journey to better health?
